overview: Some of Marching Music’s Major League™ top ensembles will come together for a night of dramatic, passionate and exceptional performances during Drum Corps at the Cinema: 2019 DCI Tour Premiere, broadcast LIVE in movie theatres nationwide!  This ninth-annual event will feature six of DCI’s top marching music ensembles: Blue Stars (La Crosse, WI), Bluecoats (Canton, OH), Boston Crusaders (Boston, MA), The Cadets (Allentown, PA), Carolina Crown (Fort Mill, SC), and Phantom Regiment (Rockford, IL).
tagline: Some of Marching Music’s Major League™ top ensembles will come together for a night of dramatic, passionate and exceptional performances during Drum Corps at the Cinema:
title: DCI 2019 Tour Premiere
